about_the_game:
Young Nautical Ship… you are granted a special Operation EXP Boost that contains a special item - Leader Training Manual.

By using the Leader Training Manual, you can give your character a special experience boost to help them level up!

The Operation EXP Boost is an item that can be equipped with any playable character (Note: Support Characters cannot equip the Operation EXP Boost).
detailed_description:
Young Nautical Ship… you are granted a special Operation EXP Boost that contains a special item - Leader Training Manual.

By using the Leader Training Manual, you can give your character a special experience boost to help them level up!

The Operation EXP Boost is an item that can be equipped with any playable character (Note: Support Characters cannot equip the Operation EXP Boost).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit (DirectX 11 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core-I5 3.2GHz or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 11 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements

short_description: The Operation EXP Boost grants a Leader Training Manual that helps boost experience for the character of your choice!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
